#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
int a,b,m,n,p,grid[1002][1002];
cin>>m>>n>>p;
for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
 for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
   grid[i][j]=0;
while(p--)
{
 cin>>a>>b;
 grid[a][b]=-1;
}
if(grid[1][1]!=-1&&grid[m][n]!=-1)
{
grid[1][1]=1;
for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
{
  for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
  {
     if(grid[i][j]==-1||(i==1&&j==1))
      continue;
     if(j==1)
      {if(grid[i-1][j]==1)
      grid[i][j]=grid[i-1][j];
      }
     else if(i==1)
      {if(grid[i][j-1]==1)
        grid[i][j]=grid[i][j-1];
      }
     else {
       if(grid[i-1][j]!=-1)
       grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i-1][j])%MOD;
       if(grid[i][j-1]!=-1)
       grid[i][j]=(grid[i][j]+grid[i][j-1])%MOD;
       grid[i][j]%=MOD;
     }
  }
}
/*for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
 {for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
  cout<<grid[i][j]<<"  ";
  cout<<endl;
 }
*/
cout<<grid[m][n]<<endl;
}
else cout<<0<<endl;
return 0;
}
